item.title: Need help with sommet
item.dc:creator: @xxxxsparkyxxxx xxxxsparkyxxxx
item.description:
@xxxxsparkyxxxx wrote:

ok ive made this code for my basic members system

if((playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4151) && q2 == 0){ addItem(4151, 1); playerEquipmentN[playerWeapon] = -1; playerEquipmentN[playerWeapon] = 0; setEquipment(1321, 1,playerWeapon); sM("Your not a member now!"); sM("so you cant wear members items!"); }

it works, but when they log out n back in it sets weapon back to whipâ€¦

im using deltascape base

what iv done is took out most of quests,
and change rune mysteries to members system
so when theyre members
q2 will be 15 n say members in green like quests etc
